title: DDFP 264: World Cup Special
itunes:title: DDFP 264: World Cup Special
description:
Shek is joined by producer Black Tie and NFL ATL producer The Gold Standard for a special World Cup 2014 podcast extravaganza. Listen as a keen Shek learns about the beautiful game with discussion topics including: the dream finals matchup, top players to watch, if Team USA can make it out of the "Group of Death", best uniform kit and much more. Plus, what can the NFL and other american sports learn from soccer? It's a worldly #DDFP experience even non-soccer fans won't want to miss. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
